title: TextWorld Memory Retrieval Schema
description: Schema for retrieving relevant episodic memories from past TextWorld experiences

memories.description: List of relevant memories (0-5). Return empty array if no relevant memories.

outcome.description: Whether the action led to positive, negative, or neutral results

confidence.description: Confidence in this memory's relevance (0.0-1.0, based on recency and similarity)

summary.description: Brief summary of what happened (context + action + outcome)

context.description: Optional: The room or situation where this occurred
